text.text_translated:
Before, I worked five days a week.
Then I had my children.
I took time off work.
I wanted to spend more time with them.
I wanted this before they start school.
So I talked to my boss.
We agreed I can work three days a week.
This meant I get less money.
I only get paid for the days I work.
But I see a problem now.
The amount of my work is the same.
I do five days of work in only three days.
And I get much less money for it.
